name.en: Lideta Sub-city Culture and Arts Office
name.or: Waajjira Bulchiinsa Aadaa fi Aartii Magaalaa Lidetaa

shortDescription.am: የልደታ ክ/ከተማ ባህል፣ ኪነጥበብ፣ ታሪክ እና ተፈጥሮ መስህቦችን የሚጠብቅ እና የሚያልም የባህል አገልግሎት ቢሮ።
shortDescription.en: Lideta Sub-city office promoting and preserving cultural heritage, arts, history, and natural attractions.
shortDescription.or: Waajjira magaalaa Lidetaa aadaa, aartii, seenaa fi uumamaa kunuunsuu fi misoomsuuf hojjata.

vision.am: በ2022 የባህልና ኪነጥበብ ዘርፍን በማላቅ ከቀዳሚ የከተማችን ማህበራዊና ኢኮኖሚያዊ ብልፅግና መሠረቶች አንዱ ማድረግ፤
vision.en: By 2022, to make the culture and arts sector one of the primary foundations of our city's social and economic prosperity.
vision.or: Bara 2022tti damee aadaa fi aartii guddisuun bu'uura badhaadhina hawaasummaa fi dinagdee magaalaa keenyaa keessaa tokko taasisuu.

mission.am: የከተማችንን ሕዝብ ባህላዊ፣ ኪነ ጥበባዊ፣ ታሪካዊ እና ተፈጥሮአዊ መስህቦችን በማጥናት፣ በመጠበቅ፣ በማልማት፣ በማስተዋወቅና ለማህበረሰቡ ተደራሽ በማድረግ እና የከተማችንን መልካም ገጽታ በመገንባት ዘላቂ የሆነ፣ ማህበራዊና ምጣኔ ሀብታዊ ብልፅግናን ማረጋገጥ፣
mission.en: To ensure sustainable social and economic prosperity for the people of our city by studying, preserving, developing, promoting and making accessible to the community the cultural, artistic, historical and natural attractions of our city and by building the beautiful image of our city.
mission.or: Hawwata aadaa, aartii, seenaa fi uumamaa magaalaa keenyaa qorachuu, kunuunsuu, misoomsuu, beeksisuu fi hawaasaaf dhaqqabamaa taasisuudhaan akkasumas fakkii bareedaa magaalaa keenyaa ijaaruun badhaadhina hawaasummaa fi dinagdee itti fufiinsa qabu ummata magaalaa keenyaa mirkaneessuuf.

am: የእደ ጥበብ ማህበራት እንዲደራጁ የተለያዩ ሙያዊ ድጋፍችን መስጠት
የባህል/በዕደ ጥበብ ምርቶች አውደ ርዕይ የማዘጋጀት አገልግሎት
በባህል ዘርፍ አዲስ የብቃት ማረጋገጫ አገልግሎት
በባህል ዘርፍ እድሳት የብቃት ማረጋገጫ አገልግሎት
በጠቃሚ የባህል እሴቶችን በማኅበረሰቡ ዘንድ የማስረፅና የብዛሀ ባህል አካታች ስራዎች አገልግልሎት
የአሉታዊ መጤ ባህሎች እና መከላከከል ስልጠናና የግንዛቤ ማስጨበጫ አገልግልሎት
ህዝባዊና መንግስታዊ ከተማ አቀፍ የባህል ቀናትና ሁነቶች ከበራ
የኪነ-ጥበብ አዲስ የብቃት ማረጋገጫ አገልግሎት መስጠት
የኪነጥበብ የሙያ ብቃት እድሳት አገልግሎት መስጠት

name.or: Waajjira Eegumsa Naannoo Bulchiinsa Kutaa Magaalaa Lidataa

shortDescription.am: የልደታ ክ/ከተማ አካባቢ ጥበቃ ጽ/ቤት ንጹህ እና ጤናማ አካባቢ ለማረጋገጥ የብክለት ቁጥጥር፣ የአረንጓዴ አካባቢዎች ክትትል እና የአየር ንብረት ለውጥ እክል ስራዎችን የሚያካሂድ ቢሮ ነው።
shortDescription.en: Lideta Sub-City office ensuring clean and healthy environment through pollution control, green area monitoring, and climate change initiatives.
shortDescription.or: Waajjira magaalaa Lidetaa naannoo qulqulluu fi fayyaa qabeessa mirkaneessuuf faalama to'achuu, naannoo magariisaa hordofuu fi jijjiirama qilleensaa qorannuudhaan hojjata.

vision.am: ክ/ከተማችንን በ2022 ዓ.ም ከአካባቢ ብክለት ተጠብቃ ውጤታማ የስርዓተ ምህዳር አጠቃቀም የሚካሄድባት እና ለነዋሪዎቿምቹና ጤናማ ክፍለ ከተማ ማድረግ ነው፡፡
vision.en: To protect our sub-city from environmental pollution and make it a clean and healthy sub-city with efficient environmental management by the year 2022 E.C. ensuring a pleasant and healthy living environment for its residents.
vision.or: Bara 2022 A.L.I tti magaalaan keenya magaalaa qulqulluu, Faalama irraa bilisa, naannoo itti fufinsaan jiraattota isheetiif qulqulluufi fayyaa qabeetti taate gochu.

mission.am: የክ/ከተማችን የሕዝብን ግንዛቤና ተሳትፎን በማሳደግ በጥናትና በቴክኖሎጂ የታገዘ የብክለትና የአረንጓዴ አካባቢዎች ክትትልና ቁጥጥር በማድረግ፣ ልማትን ከአካባቢ ጋር በማጣጣም፤ የአየር ንብረት ለውጥ ተፅዕኖን በማላመድ /Adaptation/ እና በማስተሰረይ /mitigation/፤እንዲሁም ዘላቂ የተፈጥሮ ሃብት አስተዳደር በማሳደግ የክፍለ ከተማው ነዋሪ በንፁህና ጤናማ አካባቢ የመኖር መብቱ እንዲጠበቅ ማድረግ፡፡
mission.en: By enhancing public awareness and participation, conducting pollution and green area monitoring supported by research and technology, and harmonizing development with environmental protection; by promoting climate change adaptation and mitigation, and by strengthening sustainable natural resource management --- ensuring that the residents of the sub-city enjoy their right to live in a clean and healthy environment.
mission.or: Mirgi jiraattota magaalaa keenyaa naannoo qulqulluufi fayya qabeessa ta'e keessa jiraachuuf hubannoo hawaasaafi hirmaannaa qorannoofi teeknooloojii irratti hundaa'e hordoffiifi to'annoo faalamaa fi naannoo magariisaa irratti dabaluudhaan, misooma naannoo waliin walsimsiisuun akka eegamu gochuu; dhiibbaa jijjiirama qilleensaa madaqsuu fi salphisuudhaan; akkasumas bulchiinsa qabeenya uumamaa itti fufiinsa qabu guddisuudhaan.

am: በአካባቢ ብክለት፣ በአየር ንብረት ለውጥ፣ በአማራጭ የኢነርጂ ቴክኖሎጅዎች እና በብዝሃ ህይወትአያያዝ ዙሪያ ስልጠናዎች፣ ውይይቶችና አውደ ጥናቶችን በማዘጋጀት ለማህበረሰቡ ግንዛቤ ይፈጥራል
ከፋብሪካዎችና ከሌሎች አገልግሎት ሰጪ ተቋማት የሚመነጩ ዝቃጭ፣ ተረፈምርትና ቆሻሻ በተገቢው መንገድ መወገዱን ይከታተላል፤ ይቆጣጠራል፤ በህግ አግባብ እርምጃ ይወስዳል፤ እንዲወሰድ ያደርጋል
ከተለያዩ አገልግሎት ሰጪ ተቋማት የሚመነጩ የአየር፣ የድምጽ እና የፍሳሽ ብክለትን በህግ መሰረት ይቆጣጠራል፤ እርምጃ ይወስዳል/ እንዲወሰድ ያደርጋል
የአካባቢ ጥበቃ ሕጎችን መሠረት በማድረግ የማምረቻና የአገልግሎት መስጫ ተቋማት እና ሌሎች አካባቢ ላይ ተፅእኖ የሚያሳድሩ አካላት የብክለት መከላከል የብቃት ማረጋገጫ የምስክር ወረቀት ይሰጣል
ከሚፈለገው በላይ በማደግ በሰውና በንብረት ላይ ጉዳት ሊያደርሱ የሚችሉ እና ከመብራት ጋር ንክኪ የሚፈጥሩ ዛፎች ሲኖሩ የምልመላና የቆረጣ ፍቃድ ይሰጣል፤ ከጽ/ቤቱ እውቅናና ፈቃድ ውጭ እንዳይቆረጡ ክትትልና ቁጥጥርም ያደርጋል
በአስተዳደሩ ይዞታ ስር የሚገኙ ጥብቅ የደን ቦታዎች፣ የወንዝ ዳርቻዎች፣ የጋራ መገልገያ አረንጓዴ ቦታዎች ለታለመላቸው ዓላማ መዋላቸውን ይከታተላል፤ ይቆጣጠራል
በተፋሰስና በአረንጓዴ አካባቢዎች ልማትና አገልግሎት ዘርፎች መሠማራት ለሚፈልጉ የግል ባለሀብቶች፣ የሃይማኖት ድርጅቶች፣ ነዋሪዎች ወይም ሌሎች አካላት የብቃት ማረጋገጫ የምስክር ወረቀት ይሰጣል፤ ይከታተላል፤ ይቆጣጠራል
የአየር ንብረት ለውጥ የማይበገር አረንጓዴ ኢኮኖሚ ስልትን ሁሉም ሴክተሮች በእቅዳቸው አካተው እንዲተገብሩ በማድረግ የአየር ንብረት ለውጥን ተፅዕኖ መቋቋም እንዲቻል ያስተባብራል፤ ግንዛቤዎችን ይፈጥራል
አማራጭ የኢነርጂ ቴኮኖሎጂዎችን አጠቃቀም በማስተዋወቅና አምራቾችን በመደገፍ እንዲስፋፋ ማድረግና የኢነርጅ ብክነትን የመቀነስ ስራዎችን ይሰራል
en: Create public awareness by organizing trainings, discussions, and workshops related to environmental pollution, climate change, alternative energy technologies, and biodiversity management

Monitor and supervise the proper disposal of emissions, by-products, and waste generated from factories and other service-providing institutions; take legal action or ensure that legal measures are taken
Monitor and take action on air, noise, and wastewater pollution caused by various service-providing institutions based on legal requirements

Issue pollution control competency certificates to manufacturing and service-providing institutions, as well as other entities that may have environmental impacts, in accordance with environmental protection laws

Issue pruning and cutting permits for trees that grow excessively, pose risks to people or property, or interfere with electric power lines; monitor and control illegal tree cutting without the office's approval and permission
Supervise and monitor protected forest areas, riverbanks, and communal green spaces under its administrative jurisdiction to ensure they are preserved for their intended purposes

Provide competency certification, follow-up, and monitoring to private investors, religious institutions, residents, or other entities that wish to engage in development and service delivery within designated expansion and green areas
Coordinate climate change response efforts by ensuring all sectors integrate resilient green economy strategies into their plans and by creating awareness to support climate adaptation
Promote the use of alternative energy technologies by raising awareness, supporting producers to scale up their products, and undertaking activities that reduce energy inefficiency
or: Faalama naannoo, jijjiirama qilleensaa, teeknooloojiiwwan anniisaa filatamoo fi kunuunsa heddummina lubbu qabeeyyii irratti leenjii, marii fi workishooppii qopheessuun hawaasa biratti hubannoo ni uuma
Dhangala'aa, gaasiiwwan fi balfa warshaalee fi dhaabbileen tajaajila kennan biro maddisiisan sirnaan akka gataman ni hordofa; nito'ata; tarkaanfii seeraa ni fudhata; akka fudhatamu ni mirkaneessa
Faalama qilleensaa, sagalee fi xuraa'aa dhaabbilee tajaajila adda addaatiin uumamu akkaataa seeraatiin ni to'ata; tarkaanfi ni fudhata/ akka fudhatamu ni mirkaneessa
Bu'uura seera eegumsa naannootiin dhaabbilee oomishaa fi tajaajila kennitootaa fi dhaabbilee biro naannoo irratti dhiibbaa qabaniif raga gahumsa ittisa faalamaa ni kenna

Mukkeen garmalee guddatan, namoota ykn qabeenyaa irratti balaa geessisan, ykn sarara humnaelektirikii gidduu seenaniif hayyama ciruu fi muruu ni kenna; hayyamaa fi beekamtii waajjirichaa malee muka seeraan ala muramu hordofuu fi to'achuu
Bakkeewwan bosona eegumsa argatan, qarqara laggewwanii, fi iddoowwan magariisaa hawaasaa aangoo bulchiinsaa isaa jala jiran to'achuu fi hordofuun kaayyoo yaadameef akka kunuunfaman ni taasisa

Invastaroota dhuunfaa, dhaabbilee amantii, jiraattota, yookiin qaamolee biro dame misoomaa magariisaa fi tajaajilaa bishaan kuufamaa fi naannoo magariisaa irratti bobba'uu barbaadaniif raga gahumsaa ni kenna; ni hordofa; fi ni to'ta

Dameewwan hundi karoora isaanii keessatti tarsiimoo dinagdee magariisaa haala qilleensaa dandamatu hojii irra oolchuu akka danda'aniif qindeessee hubannoo ni uuma, kanaanis dhiibbaa jijjiirama qilleensaa ni qola
Itti fayyadama teeknooloojiiwwan anniisaa filatamoo ni jajjabeessa, oomishtoonni itti fayyadama isaanii akka guddisan fi qisaasama anniisaa akka hir'isan ni deeggara

leader.am: አቶ ቢንያም ሰይፉ የዲዛይንና ግንባታ ስራዎች ጽ/ቤት ኃላፊ
leader.en: Mr. Biniam Seifu, Head of Design and Construction Works Office
leader.or: Obbo Biniam Seifu, Mataa Waajjira Dizaayinii fi Hojii Ijaarsaa

name.am: የልደታ ክ/ከተማ ዲዛይንና ግንባታ ስራዎች ጽ/ቤት
name.en: Lideta Sub-City Design and Construction Works Office
name.or: Waajjira Dizaayinii fi Hojii Ijaarsaa Bulchiinsa Kutaa Magaalaa Lidetaa

shortDescription.am: የልደታ ክ/ከተማ የመንግስት ህንጻዎችን በወጪ ቆጣቢ ዲዛይን የሚያሰራ እና የሚገነባ የግንባታ ቢሮ።
shortDescription.en: Lideta Sub-City office designing and constructing government buildings with cost-effective designs.
shortDescription.or: Waajjira magaalaa Lidetaa dizaayinii baasii xiqqaadhaan gamoowwan mootummaa ijaaruu fi qopheessuudhaan hojjata.

vision.am: አዲስ አበባ ከተማን በ2022 ዓ/ም ከተማዋን የሚመጥኑ የህዝቡን ፍላጎት ሊያሟሉ የሚችሉ ወጪ ቆጣቢ ዲዛይኖችን በማዘጋጀት የመንግስት ህንጻዎችን ገንብቶ ለነዋሪዎቿ ተደራሽ ማድረግ፡፡
vision.en: To build government buildings in Addis Ababa by 2022, by developing cost-effective designs that meet the needs of the city and make them accessible to its residents.
vision.or: Gamoolee mootummaa Addis Ababa keessatti bara 2022tti ijaaruun, dizaayinii baasii xiqqaadhaan fedhii magaalattii guutuu fi jiraattota isheef dhaqqabamaa taasisu dha.

mission.am: አዲስ አበባ ከተማን ስታንዳርዱን በጠበቀ ወጪ ቆጣቢ ዲዛይን መሰረት የመንግስት ህንጻዎችን ገንብቶ ተደራሽ በማድረግ ለከተማዋ ነዋሪዎች ምቹ እና ጥራት ያለው አገልግሎት መስጠት፡፡
mission.en: To provide convenient and quality services to the residents of Addis Ababa by constructing government buildings in a cost-effective design that meets the city's standards.
mission.or: Gamoowwan mootummaa dizaayinii baasii xiqqaadhaan sadarkaa magaalichaa guutuu ijaaruun jiraattota magaalaa Addis Ababaaf tajaajila mijataa fi qulqullina qabu kennuu.

am: ከtake off, BOQ and Grand Summary ላይ ልዩነት የተፈጠረባቸውንና በመስክ ምልከታ የተገኙ ግኝቶች ላይ ከስራ ተቋራጩ ጋር መተማመን ላይ መድረስና የፕሮጀክቱን የመጨረሻ ክፍያ ኦዲት ሪፖርት ማጠናቀር
ፕሮጀክቶች በውለታው ላይ በተቀመጠው ጥራት፤ የጊዜ ሰሌዳ እና በተያዘለት የውለታ ዋጋ መሠረት እየተከናወኑ መሆኑን መከታተል
የአማካሪና የስራ ተቋራጭ የጊዜ ማራዘሚያ ጥያቄ መቀበል እና ተገቢነቱን ማረጋገጥ
ተጨማሪ የስራ ትዕዛዝ (Variation Orders) እና ሌሎች ከውለታ ሰነድና ዲዛይን (ንድፍ) ላይ የሌሉ የግንባታ ስራዎች(Excuted works) በአግባቡ መጠናቀቃቸውን የመስክ ምርመራ እና ልኬቶችን መውሰድ
የፀደቀን የጨረታ ሰነድ ለተቋራጭ እና አማካሪ መሸጥ
የተዘጋጀውን የጨረታ ሰነድ ላይ ማብራሪያ ለሚፈልጉ ተጫራቾች ማብራሪያ መስጠት
ተጫራቾች በቴክኒክና ፋይናሻል ግምገማ ውጤቱ ላይ ቅሬታ ካቀረቡ ምላሽ መስጠት
የግንባታ ስራው በውሉ መሰረት በጥራት መሰራቱን በማረጋገጥ ጊዜያዊ የመረካከቢያ ሰነድ በማዘጋጀት የመጀመሪያ ርክክብ መፈጸም
የመጀመሪያ ርክክብ ከተፈፀመ ከ 1 ዓመት በኃላ ግንባታው የሚስተካከል ሥራ ካለው እንዲታረም ማድረግ
የመጨረሻ ክፍያን በውለታው መሰረት አስልቶ ማቅረብ
በስራ ተቋራቾችና እና በአማካሪዎች የውለታ ሰነድ ላይ የተጣሱ ህጎች ሲኖሩ በሚመለከታቸው አካላት እርምጃ እንዲወሰድ ማድረግ
የፕሮጀክት አዋጭነት ጥናት ለሚሰራላቸው ፕሮጀክቶች ፕላን ስምምነት እንዲያቀርቡ መጠየቅና ክትትል ማድረግ
በሚመለከተው ባለድርሻ አካላት ረቂቅ የፕሮጀክት የአዋጭነት ሰነዱን ማስተቸት
የተዘጋጀውን የመጨረሻ ዲዛይን /Final Design/ በሌሎች ባለሙያዎች እና ጥያቄ አቅራቢያው ተቋም በተገኘበት ማስገምገም
en: Finalizing audit reports for project final payments by reconciling discrepancies in take off, BOQ and Grand Summary with field observation findings and reaching agreement with the contractor
Monitoring whether projects are being implemented according to the specified quality, time schedule, and contract price
Receiving and verifying the validity of time extension requests from consultants and contractors
Finalizing final negotiations with the contractor

Conducting field inspections and taking measurements to ensure proper completion of additional work orders (Variation Orders) and other construction works not included in the contract document and design
Selling approved tender documents to contractors and consultants
Providing clarifications to bidders who request explanations on the prepared tender documents
Responding to complaints from bidders regarding technical and financial evaluation results
Finalizing initial negotiations by preparing a temporary acceptance certificate after ensuring the construction work is completed according to contract quality
Ensuring correction work is done if there is any work to be adjusted one year after the initial negotiation is finalized
Calculating and presenting final payment based on the contract
Ensuring legal action is taken by relevant bodies when laws are violated in the contract documents of contractors and consultants
Requesting and following up on plan agreements for projects that require feasibility studies
Forwarding the draft project feasibility document to relevant stakeholders
Evaluating the prepared final design with other professionals and the requesting institution
or: Marii dhiyeessaa ergaa auditii kaffaltii xumuraa pirojektiifii qopheessuun garaagarummaa take off, BOQ fi Grand Summary keessatti mul'atan qorannoo iddoo keessaa argame wajjin walsimsiisuun waliigalaa kontaraakterii wajjin ga'uudhaan
Pirojektotni akkaataa qulqullina, karoora yeroo fi gatii kontiraaktii ibsameenitti hojjetamu akka jiranuu hordofuu
Hayyama dheeressaa yeroo hayyamaa fi deeggarsa hojii irraa argachuufi mirkaneessuu
Marii xumuraa kontaraakterii wajjin xumuruu

Ajjechi iddoo irraa ta'uun safartuu fi qaxxaamuraa qopheessuun sirnaan xumurma dhaabbataa ajaja dabalataa (Variation Orders) fi hojii ijaarsaa biroo barreeffama kontiraaktii fi dizaayinii keessatti hin argamin
Barreeffama hayyamaa mirkaneeffame kontaraakterootaafi deeggarsa hojii bitachuu
Ibsa barreeffama hayyamaa qopheeffame irratti ibsa barbaadan pirojektiin dhiyaatan ibsa kennuu
Deebii gaaffii pirojektiin dhiyaatan madaala teeknikaalaa fi malaqaawaa irratti kennuu
Hojii ijaarsaa akkaataa qulqullina kontiraaktii wajjin xumuramuu mirkaneessuun galmee beekumsa dhaabbataa yeroo ta'aa qopheessuun marii jalqabaa xumuruu
Marii jalqabaa yeroo xumuramu booda waggaa 1 booda hojii gadi buusu yoo jiraate akka raawwatamuu mirkaneessuu
Kaffaltii xumuraa kontiraaktii irratti hundaa'uun sirreessuu fi fiduu
Yoo seerri barreeffama kontiraaktii kontaraakterootaa fi deeggarsa hojii keessatti diigame jiraate, dhaabbilee dhimma isaanii irratti tarkaanfiilee seeraa fudhatamu akka jiranuu mirkaneessuu
Qorannoo dandeettii pirojekti barbaadan pirojektiifii waliigalota karooraa akka dhiyaatan gaafachuu fi hordofuu
Barreeffama dandeettii pirojekti darbee dhaabbilee dhimma isaanii wajjin dhiyeessuu
Dizaayinii xumuraa qopheeffame ogummaawwan biroo fi dhaabbilee gaaffii dhiyeessan wajjin madaaluu

leader.en: Head of Lideta Sub-City Trade Office
leader.or: Mataa Waajjira Daldalaa Bulchiinsa Kutaa Magaalaa Lidataa

name.or: Waajjira Daldalaa Bulchiinsa Kutaa Magaalaa Lidataa

shortDescription.am: የልደታ ክ/ከተማ ንግድ ጽ/ቤት የንግድ ምዝገባ፣ ፍቃድ እና የገበያ መረጃ አገልግሎቶችን በኦላይን እና በቀጥታ የሚሰጥ ቢሮ።
shortDescription.en: Lideta Sub-City office providing online and direct business registration, licensing, and market information services.
shortDescription.or: Waajjira magaalaa Lidetaa daldalaa galmee, hayyama, fi odeeffannoo gabaasaa sirnaan fii karaa sirrii dhiyeessuudhaan hojjata.

vision.am: በ2022 ዓ.ም የአዲስ አበባ ከተማ ዘመናዊ፣ ፍትሃዊና ተወዳዳሪ የንግድ ማዕከል ከሆኑ የአፍሪካ ከተሞች ግንባር ቀደም ከተማ ሆና ማየት፡፡
vision.en: By 2022 E.C., to be seen as the leading city among African cities as a modern, fair, and competitive trade center in Addis Ababa.
vision.or: Bara 2022 A.L.I tti magaalaa Addis Ababa garaagaraa kaabaa Afrikaa keessatti magaalaa duraanii ta'uun, giddu-galeessa daldalaa yeroo haarawaa, dogoggoraa fi dorgommii qabu ta'uun mul'achuu.

mission.am: በአዲስ አበባ ከተማ አስተዳደር የከተማውን ህብረተሰብ ተሳትፎ በማጠናከር፣ በዘመናዊ የመረጃ ቴክኖሎጂ በመታገዝ እና የንግድ ምዝገባና ፍቃድ አሰራር በማዘመን፣ ደረጃዎችን የጠበቁ የግብይት ማዕከላትን በማስፋፋት፣ ጠንካራ የክትትልና ቁጥጥር ስርዓት በመዘርጋት እና የሸማቾችን መብትና ጥቅም በማስጠበቅ ፍትሃዊ ግብይትን ማስፈን፤
mission.en: To enhance citizen participation in city administration, utilize modern information technology, streamline business registration and licensing procedures, expand monitored trade centers, establish a robust inspection and control system, and ensure fair trade by protecting the rights and benefits of traders.
mission.or: Hirmaannaa hawaasaa bulchiinsa magaalattii dabaluudhaan, itti fayyadama odeeffannoo teeknooloojii yeroo haarawaa, sirna galmee daldalaa fi hayyama laaffisuu, giddu-galeewwan daldalaa hordofamaa dabaluu, sirna hordoffii fi to'annoo cimaa ijaaruudhaan, akkasumas mirga fi faayidaa daldaltootaa eeguudhaan daldalaa dogoggoraa mirkaneessuu.

Hojii irra oolmaa

Maqaa gaarii
Positiivii ta'uu
Waliigaluu fi Qindoomina
Fayyadama Teeknooloojii

am: የበር ለበር ቁጥጥር ቴክኖሎጅ ምዝገባ ማድረግ
ንግድ ነክ መረጃ በክፍያና ያለክፍያ መስጠት

Registration using border control technology
Searching for company names
Modifying company names
Providing trade mark information with or without payment

Galmeessuu itti fayyadama teeknooloojii to'annoo balbalaa
Maqaa dhaabbataa barbaachuu
Maqaa dhaabbataa jijjiiruu
Odeeffannoo mallattoo daldalaa kaffaltii wajjin yookiin kaffaltii malee kennuu

name.am: ልደታ ክፍለ ከተማ ኢንዱስትሪ ልማት ጽ/ቤት
name.or: Waajjira Misoomsa Indaastirii Bulchiinsa Kutaa Magaalaa Lidetaa

shortDescription.am: የልደታ ክ/ከተማ ኢንዱስትሪ ልማት ጽ/ቤት አምራች ኢንዱስትሪዎችን ለማስተዳደር እና ለማሳደግ የቴክኒካል፣ የፋይናንስ እና የስልጠና ድጋፍ የሚሰጥ ቢሮ።
shortDescription.en: Lideta Sub-City office providing technical, financial, and training support to develop and manage manufacturing industries.
shortDescription.or: Waajjira magaalaa Lidetaa deeggarsa teeknikaalaa, malaqaa, fi leenjii oomishaa indaastirii misoomsuu fi bulchuu dhiyeessuudhaan hojjata.

vision.am: በክፍለ ከተማ በ2022 ብቁና ተወዳዳሪ የሆኑ እና ምርትና ምርታማነታቸው ያደገ አምራች ኢንዱስትሪዎች ተፈጥረው ማየት፤
vision.en: To see competent and competitive manufacturing industries with increased production and productivity established in the sub-city by 2022.
vision.or: Bara 2022tti kutaa magaalichaa keessatti indaastiriwwan oomishaa gahumsa fi dorgommii qaban, oomishaa fi sochowaan isaanii guddatan ijaaraman akka jiranuu arguu.

shortDescription.am: የልደታ ክ/ከተማ ትምህርት ጽ/ቤት ፍትሃዊ፣ ጥራት ያለው እና በቴክኖሎጂ የተደገፈ ትምህርት ለነዋሪዎች የሚያቀርብ ቢሮ።
shortDescription.en: Lideta Sub-City office providing fair, quality, and technology-supported education services to residents.
shortDescription.or: Waajjira magaalaa Lidetaa barnoota dogoggoraa, qulqullina qabu fi teeknooloojiin deeggarame jiraattotaaf dhiyeessuudhaan hojjata.

vision.am: በልደታ ክ/ከተማ በ2022 ውጤታማ የትምህርት ስርዓት በማስፈን ዓለም ዓቀፋዊ ተወዳዳሪ እና ለሀገር ግንባታ ቁልፍ ሚና የሚጫወት ትውልድ ማፍራት፡፡
vision.en: By 2022, Lideta Sub-City will establish an effective education system and produce a generation that is globally competitive and plays a key role in nation building.
vision.or: Bara 2022tti sirna barnootaa bu'a qabeessa ta'e diriirsuun, dhaloota dorgomaa Idil-Addunyaa ta'eefi ijaarsa biyyaatiif gahee ijoo taphatu uumuu.

mission.am: በልደታ ክ/ከተማ የትምህርት ባለድርሻ አካላትን በማሳተፍ የትምህርት ተቋማትን በፍትሃዊነት በማደረስና ተገቢ ድጋፍና ክትትል በማድረግ በቴክኖሎጂ የተደገፈ አለማቀፍ ደረጃውን የጠበቀ፣ ብቃቱና ጥራቱ የተረጋገጠ አጠቃላይ ትምህርት በተስማሚ ፕሮግራሞች ለክ/ከተማ ነዋሪዎች መስጠት፡፡
mission.en: To provide comprehensive education to the residents of Lideta Sub-City through appropriate programs, supported by technology, that meets international standards, and that is proven to be of high quality and competent.
mission.or: Dhimmamtoota barnootaa hirmaachisuun dhaabbilee barnootaa haqa qabeessaan waliin gahuufi hordoffiifi deeggarsa barbaachisaa gochuun barnoota waliigalaa teekinooloojiin deeggarame, sadarkaa Idila Addunyaatti ga'umsaafi qulqullina isaa kan eeggate sagantaalee mijataadhaan jiraattota magaalattiitiif kennuu.

am: ትምህርት ላይ ለመስራት ፕሮጅክት የሚቀርቡ መያዶች ሰነድ ለማበልፀግ የተገቢነት ማረጋገጫ አገልግሎት መስጠት
ለአከለ ጉዳተኛ ተማሪዎች የሚሆን የአካል ድጋፍ የመስጠት አገልግሎት
ለግል እና ለመንግስት ትምህርት ቤቶች መመሪያ ማስተማሪያ መፅሃፍት ማሰራጨት ማቅረብ አገልግሎት
በችግር ተጋላጭ ለሆኑ ተማሪዎች ልዩ ድጋፍ መስጠት አገልግሎት
ለግል እና ለመንግስት 2ኛ ደረጃ ት/ቤት ሱፐርቪዥን ሙያዊ ድጋፍ አገልግሎት መስጠት
ለግል እና ለመንግስት ለቅድመ መጀመሪያና መጀመሪያ ደረጃ ት/ቤት ሱፐርቪዥን ሙያዊ ድጋፍ አገልግሎት መስጠት
ለግልና ለመንግስት ለመምህራን እና ለትምህርት አመራሮች በተለያዩ አሰራሮች ላይ ሙያዊ ስልጠናዎችና የመስጠት አገልግሎት
ለ2ኛ ደረጃ ተማሪዎቸ የስነ-ልቦና የማማከር ድጋፍ አገልግሎት
ለመጀመሪያ ደረጃ ተማሪዎች የስነ-ልቦናና የመማከር አገልግሎት
ጥናት ምርምር ለሚሰሩ መምህራንና አመራሮች የማማከር አገልግሎት መስጠት
በኤች አይቪ ኤድስ መከላከል የአቻ ስልጠና
የመጤ ባህልና ሱሶች መካከል ስልጠና አገልግሎት
የተማሪዎች ስነ-ምግባር እና የህይወት ክህሎት ስልጠና አአገልግሎት
ለመምህራን እና ለትምህርት አመራሮች በተከታታይ ሙያ ማሻሻያዊ ስልጠናዎችን የመስጠት

የእንስሳት አርቢዎች ለእንስሳት አርቢዎች የእንስሳት ህክምናና የክትባት አገልግሎት ይሰጣል
የዕብድ ውሻ በሽታ መከላኪያ ክትባት ይሰጣል
ታክመው መዳን የማይችሉ እና የሌላቸውን እንስሳት ያስወግዳል
ለአርሶ አደሮች ትምህርትና ስልጠና እንዲሁም የሙያ ድጋፍ ይሰጣል
የህግ በሌላ ሁኔታ የተደነገገው እንደተጠበቀው ሆኖ በመንግስት ፤ በማህበራት እና በግል ቄራ ድርጅት የእርድ እንስሳትና ስጋ ምርመራ አገልግሎት ይሰጣል
ህገ ወጥ የእንስሳት እርድና በህገ ወጥ መንገድ የታረዱ ስጋ ዝውውርን ይቆጣጠራል
አርሶ አደሮች ባላቸው ይዞታ ላይ በግላቸው ፤ ከአርሶ አደር ጋር በመደራጀት ወይም ከባለሀብት ጋር በመጣመር እንዲያለሙ አሰራር ይዘረጋል
ለልማት ይዞታቸውን የለቀቁ የልማት ተነሺዎችን መረጃ አደራጅቶ ይይዛል
ለልማት ይዞታቸውን የለቀቁ ተነሺ አርሶ አደሮች የተሰጣቸውን ካሳ አቀናጅተው ወደ ተሻለ ልማትና የኢንቨስትመንት አማራጮች ላይ በግል ይዞታቸው ወይም ተደራጅተው የሚሰማሩበትን ስልት ይቀይሳል
en: Designs and implements urban agriculture development strategies
Encourages residents to participate in urban agriculture
Studies the spread of animal diseases
Provides veterinary treatment and vaccination services to animal breeders
Provides rabies vaccination
Eliminates animals that cannot be treated and are not available
Provides breeding services to livestock breeders
Provides education, training, and professional support to farmers
Provides animal and plant quarantine services
Provides slaughter animal and meat inspection services to government, associations and private slaughterhouses
Controls illegal slaughter of animals and the movement of illegally slaughtered meat
Establishes a system for farmers to cultivate their land individually, in collaboration with other farmers, or in partnership with investors
Organizes and maintains information on development beneficiaries who have released their land for development
Designs a strategy for farmers who have lost their land for development to use the compensation they have received and move towards better development and investment options
or: Tarsiimoo misooma qonna magaalaa qopheessee hojiirra oolcha
Jiraattonni qonna magaalaa irratti akka hirmaatan jajjabeessa
Tatamsa'ina dhukkuboota bineensotaa qorata
Horsiistota beeyladaatiif tajaajila wal'aansa beeyladaa fi talaallii kenna
Talaallii dhukkuba saree maraattee kenna
Bineensota yaalamuu hin dandeenyee fi hin argamne dhabamsiisa
Horsiistota beeyladaatiif tajaajila horsiisaa kenna
Qonnaan bultootaaf barnoota, leenjii, fi deeggarsa ogummaa kenna
Tajaajila adda baafamuu beeyladaa fi biqiltootaa kenna
Tajaajila inspeekshinii horii fi foon qalamaa mootummaa, waldaalee fi manneen qalmaa dhuunfaaf kenna
Beeylada seeraan ala qalamuu fi sochii foon seeraan ala qalame to'ata
Qonnaan bultoonni dhuunfaan, qonnaan bultoota biroo waliin ta'uun, ykn invastaroota waliin ta'uun lafa isaanii akka misoomsan sirni diriira
Fayyadamtoota misoomaa lafa isaanii misoomaaf gadi lakkisan qindeessa, eega

Qonnaan bultoonni lafa isaanii misoomaaf dhaban beenyaa argatanitti fayyadamuudhaan gara filannoo misoomaa fi invastimantii fooyya'aa ta'etti akka ce'an tooftaa dhuunfaanis ta'e haala qindaa'een qopheessa

title.am: ህብረተሰብ ተሳትፎና በጎ ፈቃድ ማስተባበሪያ ፅ/ቤት
title.en: Community Engagement and Voluntary Coordination Office
title.or: Waajjira Qindoomina Hirmaannaa Hawaasaa fi Tola Ooltummaa

name.am: የልደታ ክፍለ ከተማ ህብረተሰብ ተሳትፎና በጎ ፈቃድ ማስተባበሪያ ፅ/ቤት
name.en: Lideta Subcity Administration Community Engagement and Voluntary Coordination Office
name.or: Waajjira Qindoomina Hirmaannaa Hawaasaa fi Tola Ooltummaa Kutaa Magaalaa Lidataa

shortDescription.am: የልደታ ክፍለ ከተማ ህብረተሰብ ተሳትፎና በጎ ፈቃድ ማስተባበሪያ ፅ/ቤት የህብረተሰብ ተሳትፎ፣ የበጎ ፈቃድ እና የአካባቢ ሰላም ለማረጋገጥ የሚሰራ ቢሮ።
shortDescription.en: Lideta Sub-City office working to ensure community participation, voluntary service, and local peace through block organization and coordination.
shortDescription.or: Waajjira magaalaa Lidetaa hirmaannaa hawaasaa, tajaajila tola ooltummaa, fi nageenya naannoo gurmaa'ina bilookii fi qindoominaan mirkaneessuudhaan hojjata.

vision.am: በ2022 ዓ.ም የለማ የህብረተሰብ ተሳትፎና ተጠቃሚነት በማረጋገጥ በጎ ፈቃድን ባህሉ ያደረገ ማህበረሰብ ተፈጥሮ ማየት፡፡
vision.en: By 2022, to see the nature of a society that has made goodwill a culture by ensuring social participation and benefit.
vision.or: Bara 2022 tti maalummaa hawaasa hirmaannaa fi fayyadamummaa hawaasaa mirkaneessuun fedhii gaarii aadaa godhe ilaaluuf.

mission.am: በከተማው አስተዳደሩ ብሎክን ማዕከል ያደረገ የአገልግሎት አሰጣጥ፣ የመሠረተ ልማት፣ የፀጥታ ችግሮችን እና የበጎ ፈቃድ ተግባራት ፍላጎትን በመለየት የህብረተሰቡን ተሳትፎ በማጎልበት ችግሮችን ከምንጫቸው እንዲፈቱ በማድረግ የህብረተሰቡን ፍትሃዊ ተጠቃሚነት ማረጋገጥ ፡፡
mission.en: By identifying the need for block-centered service delivery, infrastructure, security problems and voluntary activities by the city administration, enhancing community participation and solving problems from their source, ensuring the equitable benefit of the community.
mission.or: Barbaachisummaa kenniinsa tajaajilaa bilookii giddu galeessa godhate, bu'uuraalee misoomaa, rakkoo nageenyaa fi hojii tola ooltummaa bulchiinsa magaalichaa adda baasuun, hirmaannaa hawaasaa guddisuu fi rakkoolee madda isaanii irraa furuun, fayyadamummaa haqa qabeessa hawaasaa mirkaneessuudhaan.

am: በብሎክ የደንብ ጥሰት ሊፈጥሩ የሚችሉ ጉዳዮችን በጥናት መለየት
የብሎክ አደረጃጀትን በመጠቀም ሰላምና ጸጥታን የተመለከተ ወቅታዊ የመረጃ ልውውጥ ማድረግ
የብሎክ አደረጃጀቶችን በመጠቀም ህገ-ወጥ ተግባራትን መከላከል
በብሎክ አደረጀጃቶች ላይ የሚነሱ የአገልግሎት አሰጣጥ ችግሮችን በመለየት ከሚመከተው አካል ጋር እንዲፈታ ማመቻቸት
የበጎ ፈቃድ አገልግሎት ፍላጎት ዳሰሳ ጥናት
በጎ ፈቃድን የሚተገብሩ መደበኛ እና መደበኛ ያልሆኑ ማህበራትን፣ ግለሰቦች ማደራጀት
በጎ ፈቃደኛ በመረጃ ቋት ምዝገባ ማከናወን
በበጎ ፈቃድ ዙሪያ ጽንሰ ሃሳብ መፍጠር
በህብረተሰቡ የሚገነቡ መሰረተ ልማቶች የጨረታ ውለታ ማስተዳደር
በህብረተሰቡ የሚገነቡ መሰረተ ልማቶች ክትትል፣ ቁጥጥርና ርክክብ ማድረግ
የብሎክ እና የመሰረተ ልማት መረጃን መሰብሰብና ማደራጀት
en: To identify issues that may cause violation of rules in the block
To exchange information about peace and tranquility using block organization
Prevention of illegal activities using block arrangements
Protecting environmental peace through community participation
Creating awareness and movement for the society
Provide capacity building training
Facilitating the identification of service delivery problems arising in block organizations and solving them with the concerned party
Enhancing the project and raising resource
Voluntary service demand survey
To organize formal and informal associations and individuals who implement goodwill
Perform volunteer database registration
Create a concept around voluntary
Implementation of voluntary service
Involvement of voluntary council
Management of tenders for infrastructures to be built by the community
Monitoring, control and delivery of infrastructures built by the community
Collecting and organizing block and infrastructure information
or: Dhimmoota bilookicha keessatti seera cabsuu fiduu danda'an adda baasuu
Gurmaa'ina bilookii fayyadamuun waa'ee nagaa fi tasgabbii odeeffannoo wal jijjiiruu
Qophii bilookii fayyadamuun hojiiwwan seeraan alaa ittisuu
Hirmaannaa hawaasaatiin nageenya naannoo eeguu
Hawaasaaf hubannoo fi sochii uumuu
Leenjii ijaarsa dandeettii ni kenna
Rakkoolee kenniinsa tajaajilaa jaarmiyaalee bilookii keessatti uumaman adda baasuun qaama dhimmi ilaallatu waliin furuuf haala mijeessuu
Pirojekticha guddisuu fi qabeenya walitti qabuu
Qorannoon fedhii tajaajila tola ooltummaa
Waldaalee idilee fi al-seerummaa fi namoota dhuunfaa fedhii gaarii hojiirra oolchan gurmeessuu
Galmee kuusa deetaa tola ooltummaa ni raawwata
Yaad-rimee naannoo tola ooltummaa uumuu
Raawwii tajaajila tola ooltummaa
Hirmaannaa mana maree tola ooltummaa
Bulchiinsa caalbaasii bu'uuraalee misoomaa hawaasni ijaaruuf
Hordoffii, to'annoo fi kenniinsa bu'uuraalee misoomaa hawaasni ijaarame
Odeeffannoo bilookii fi bu'uuraalee misoomaa walitti qabuu fi gurmeessuu

name.am: የልደታ ክፍለ ከተማ ፕላንና ልማት ጽ/ቤት
name.en: Lideta Sub-City Planning and Development Office
name.or: Waajjira Karooraa fi Misoomaa Bulchiinsa Kutaa Magaalaa Lidetaa

shortDescription.am: የልደታ ክፍለ ከተማ ፕላንና ልማት ጽ/ቤት ዘመናዊ ፕላን በማዘጋጀት እና ክትትል በማድረግ የከተማውን ልማት ለማፋጠን የሚሰራ ቢሮ።
shortDescription.en: Lideta Sub-City office working to accelerate city development through modern planning preparation and monitoring.
shortDescription.or: Waajjira magaalaa Lidetaa karoora ammayyaa qopheessuu fi hordofuudhaan misooma magaalichaa saffisuu hojjata.

vision.am: በ2022 ዓ/ም አዲስ አበባ ከተማ በዘመናዊ ፕላን የምትመራ የለማችና የበለፀገች ከተማ ሆና ማየት
vision.en: By 2022, Addis Ababa will be a prosperous city guided by a modern plan.
vision.or: Bara 2022tti Addis Ababaan magaalaa badhaate karoora ammayyaatiin qajeelfamtu ta'a.

mission.am: ህብረተሰቡንና የባለድርሻ አካላትን ተሳትፎ መሰረት ያደረገ የተቀናጀ ፕላን በማዘጋጀት እና ክትትል፣ ቁጥጥርና ድጋፍ በማካሄድ ጠቃሚነቱን ለሕዝብ በማስረጽ ከተማዋን በፕላን በመምራት እና ልማቷን በማፋጠን ነዋሪዎቿን ተጠቃሚ ማድረግ
mission.en: An integrated plan based on the participation of the community and stakeholders By preparing and monitoring, controlling and supporting the city, it is important to the public To benefit its residents by planning and speeding up its development
mission.or: Karoora walitti hidhame hirmaannaa hawaasaa fi qooda fudhattoota irratti hundaa'e Magaalattii qopheessuu, hordofuu, to'achuu fi deeggaruu ummataaf barbaachisaa dha Misooma isaa karoorsuu fi saffisiisuun jiraattota ishee fayyadamoo taasisuu

am: ከተማዋ የምትመራበት ጥራት ያለውና ተተግባሪ የስፓሻል ፕላን ዝገጅት ሽፋንን ማሳደግ
በክትትል፣ በግምገማና በቁጥጥር የስፓሻል ፕላን ትግበራ አፈፃፀም ውጤታማነት ማረጋገጥ
የማህበራዊ ኢኮኖሚ ልማት እቅድ ዝግጅት፣ ክትትልና ግምገማ ስርዓት ማሻሻል
የማህበራዊ-ኢኮኖሚ ፕላን አፈፃፀምና የልማት ፕሮጀክቶች ክትትልና ግምገማ እንዲሁም የተቋማት አፈፃፀም ምዘና ስራዎችን ማሻሻል
የፕላን መረጃ ዝግጅት አደረጃጀትና ስርጭትን ማሳደግ
en: To increase the coverage of quality and practical spatial plan preparation for the city
Ensuring the effectiveness of the implementation of the spatial plan through monitoring, evaluation and control
Improving social economic development planning, monitoring and evaluation system
Monitoring and evaluation of the implementation of socio-economic plan and development projects as well as improving the performance evaluation of institutions
To increase the organization and distribution of planning information
or: Uwwisa qulqullinaa fi qophii pilaanii iddoo qabatamaa magaalattii guddisuuf
Bu'a qabeessummaa raawwii karoora iddoo hordoffii, madaallii fi to'annootiin mirkaneessuu
Sirna karoora, hordoffii fi madaallii misooma dinagdee hawaasummaa fooyyessuu
Hordoffii fi madaallii raawwii karoora hawaas-dinagdee fi pirojektoota misoomaa akkasumas madaallii raawwii hojii dhaabbilee fooyyessuu
Gurmaa'ina fi raabsa odeeffannoo karooraa guddisuuf

name.am: የልደታ ክፍለ ከተማ የሴቶችና ህፃናት ጉዳይ ጽ/ቤት
name.en: Lideta Sub-City Women and Children Affairs Office
name.or: Waajjira Dhimma Dubartootaa fi Daa'immanii Bulchiinsa Kutaa Magaalaa Lidetaa

shortDescription.am: የልደታ ክፍለ ከተማ የሴቶችና ህፃናት ጉዳይ ጽ/ቤት ለሴቶች፣ ህፃናት፣ አካል ጉዳተኞች እና አረጋዊያን መብት እና ደህንነት ለማረጋገጥ የሚሰራ ቢሮ።
shortDescription.en: Lideta Sub-City office working to protect the rights and security of women, children, persons with disabilities, and the elderly.
shortDescription.or: Waajjira magaalaa Lidetaa dubartoota, daa'imman, qaama miidhamtootaa fi maanguddootaa mirgaa fi nageenyii eeguudhaan hojjata.

vision.am: በ2022 ዓ.ም አዲስ አበባ የሴቶች፣ የህጻናት፣ የአካል ጉዳተኞችና አረጋዊያን መብትና ደህንነት የተረጋገጠባት፤ የማህበራዊ ጥበቃ አገልግሎቶች የተስፋፉባት እና የስርዓተ-ፆታ እኩልነት የጎለበተባት ከተማ ሆና ማየት፡፡
vision.en: To ensure social protection initiatives, expanded gender equality to promote where the rights and security of women, children, persons with disabilities and elderly up to 2022 E.c in Addis Ababa city.
vision.or: Bara 2022tti Magaalaan Finfinnee Dubartoota, Daa'imman, Qaama Miidhamtootaa fi Maanguddootaa Mirgaa fi nageenyi isaanii kan itti mirkanaa'e, Tajaajilli kan hawaasummaa kan itti babala'atee fi Magaalaa walqixxummaan koorniyaa itti jabaate taatee arguu!

mission.am: በህብረተሰቡ ዘንድ የተዛባ የስርዓተ-ፆታ አመለካከትን በመቀየር፤ ማህበራዊ ችግሮች በመከላከል፤ መብትና ደህንነት በማስከበር፤ድጋፍና ክብካቤ አገልግሎት በማስፋፋት፣ የሴቶችን፣ሕፃናትና አካል ጉዳተኞችን ጉዳይ አካትቶ ትግበራ በማረጋገጥ ፣ ህብረተሰቡን በማሳተፍና ባለድርሻ አካላት ድጋፍ በማቀናጀት እና አደረጃጀቶችን በማጠናከር የሴቶች፣ ህፃናት፣ አካል ጉዳተኞች፣ አረጋዊያን እና ሌሎች ልዩ ትኩረት የሚሹ የህብረተስብ ክፍሎች ተሳትፎ አጎልብቶ በማብቃትና በማሸጋገር በሁሉም መስክ እኩል ተሳታፊና ተጠቃሚ እንዲሆኑ ማድረግ፡፡
mission.en: By changing gender stereotypes in society; addressing social problems; protecting rights and security; expanding support and advocacy; ensuring implementation that includes the issues of women, children and people with disabilities; engaging the community and coordinating the support of stakeholders; and strengthening organizations to empower and transform the participation of women, children, people with disabilities, the elderly, and other vulnerable groups in society so that they can participate and benefit equally in all fields.
mission.or: Ilaalcha Walmakaa hawaasni keenya koorniyaaf qabu jijjiiruun, Rakkoo hawaasummaa ittisuun, Mirgaa fi nageenya kabachiisuun, Tajaajila Deggarsaa fi Kunuunsaa Babal'isuun Dubartoota, Daa'imman fi Qaama Miidhamtootaa tajaajila hunda galeessa mirkaneessuun hawaasa hunda kan hirmaachisuu fi deggersa abbaa dhimmaa qindeessuu fi Caasaawwan jabeessuun Dubartoota, Daa'imman, Qaama Miidhamtootaa, Maanguddootaa fi qaamota Xiyyeeffannoo addaa barbaadan jabeessee ga'oomsuu fi ceesisuudhaan karaa hundumaa hirmaannaa fi faayidaa Walqixxee akka argatan taasisuu

Compassion

Participation

Leading/Working with Knowledge and Faith
Readiness for Change

Rahmata

Hirmaannaa

name.am: የልደታ ክፍለ ከተማ መስሪያ ቦታ ጽ/ቤት
name.or: Waajjira Bakka Hojii Bulchiinsa Kutaa Magaalaa Lidetaa

shortDescription.am: የልደታ ክፍለ ከተማ መስሪያ ቦታ ጽ/ቤት ዘመናዊ የመስሪያ ቦታዎችን በመስራት ለኢንተርፕራዞች እና ኢንዱስትሪዎች ኢኮኖሚያዊ ተጠቃሚነት ለማረጋገጥ የሚሰራ ቢሮ።
shortDescription.en: Lideta Sub-City office developing modern workspaces to ensure economic benefits for enterprises and industries through efficient service delivery.
shortDescription.or: Waajjira magaalaa Lidetaa bakko hojii ammayyaa ijaaruudhaan dhaabbilee fi indastiriiwwan fayyadamummaa diinagdee argachuuf tajaajila gahaa dhiyeessuudhaan hojjata.

vision.am: በ2022 ዓ.ም ዘመናዊ የመስሪያ ቦታ በማልማት አቅርቦቱን በማፋጠንና አስተዳደራዊ አሰራሩን በማዘመን በዘርፉ የተሰማሩ ኢንተርፕራዞች እና ኢንዱስትሪዎች ኢኮኖሚያዊ ተጠቃሚነት ተረጋግጦ ማየት፡፡
vision.en: To see enterprises and industries engaged in the sector achieve economic benefit by developing modern work places, accelerating supply and modernizing administrative procedures in the 2022.
vision.or: Bara baajataa itoophiyaa 2022tti, bakko hojii ammayyuumuun, dhiyeessii saffisiisuun fi adeemsa bulchiinsaa harromsuun, dhaabbilee fi indastiriiwwan dameekanaan bobba'an fayyadamummaa diinagdee isaanii mirkaneeffatanii arguu.

mission.am: የዘርፉን እድገት ያማከለ ተጨባጭ ጥናት ላይ የተመሰረተ እና መሰረተ ልማት የተሟላላት ደረጃውን የጠበቀ የመስሪያ ቦታ ገንብቶ በማስተላለፍ እና ፈጣን አገልግሎትን መሰረት ያደረገ ዘመናዊ አስተዳደርን በመዘርጋት የኢንተርፕራዞች እና አምራች ኢንዱስትሪዎችን ተጠቃሚነት ማረጋገጥ ነው፡፡
mission.en: The goal is to ensure the benefit of enterprises and manufacturing industries by developing and transferring a standardized workplace with complete infrastructure, based on concrete studies focused on sectorial growth, and by establishing a modern administration based on fast service.
mission.or: Kaayyoon isaa bakka hojii sadarkaa isaa eeggate kan bu'uuraalee misoomaa guutuu qabu, qo'annoo dhugaa guddata damee irratti xiyyeeffatuun hojjetamee dabarssuun, akkasumas bulchiinsa ammayyaa tajaajila saffisaa irratti hundaa'e diriirsuun, fayyadamummaa dhaabbilee xixiqqaa fi giddugaleessaa (enterpiraayizii) fi warshaalee oomishaa mirkaneessuu dha.

Accountability

name.am: የልደታ ክፍለ ከተማ ወጣቶችና ስፖርት ጽ/ቤት
name.en: Lideta Sub-City Youth and Sport Office
name.or: Waajjira Dargaggootaa fi Isportii Bulchiinsa Kutaa Magaalaa Lidetaa

shortDescription.am: የልደታ ክፍለ ከተማ ወጣቶችና ስፖርት ጽ/ቤት ወጣቶችን ለማሳተፍ እና ስፖርትን ለማዳበር የሚሰራ ቢሮ።
shortDescription.en: Lideta Sub-City office working to engage youth and develop sports through centers, training, and competition programs.
shortDescription.or: Waajjira magaalaa Lidetaa dargaggoota hirmaachisuu fi ispoortii buufataalee, leenjii, fi dorgommii sagantaadhaan misoomsuudhaan hojjata.

vision.am: በ2022 ዓ.ም ተሳታፊና ተጠቃሚ የሆነ ወጣት፤ ስፖርትን ባህሉ ያደረገ ህብረተሰብ እና ተወዳዳሪና ውጤታማ የሆነ ስፖርተኛ ተፈጥሮ ማየት፡፡
vision.en: To see the creation of youth who are participants and beneficiaries by the year 2022 E.C.; a society that has made sport its culture; and athletes who are competitive and successful.
vision.or: Baroota 2022tti dargaggoonni hirmaatoo fi fayyadamtoota ta'an, hawaasni ispoortii aadaa isaa godhatee fi atileetonni dorgommii fi bu'a qabeessa ta'an uumamanii arguu.

mission.am: ማዕከላትና ማዘውተሪያ ስፍራዎችን በማስፋፋትና አቅማቸውን በማጎልበት፣ ማህበራትን በማጠናከር፣ የንቅናቄና ተሳትፎ ፕሮግራሞችን በመዘርጋት፤ወጣቶችን በአመለካካትና በክህሎት በመቅረፅ፣ ተሳታፊና ተጠቃሚ ማድረግ እና የስፖርት ልማትን ማዘመን፡፡
mission.en: Modernizing youth participation and sport development by expanding centers and recreational areas and strengthening their capacity, reinforcing associations, rolling out mobilization and participation programs; shaping youth in attitude and skill, and making them participants and beneficiaries.
mission.or: Buufataalee fi iddoowwan shaakalaa babal'isuu fi dandeettii isaanii cimsuun, waldaalee jabeessuun, sagantaalee sochiif qooda fudhannaa diriirsuun; dargaggoota ilaalchaa fi dandeettiin boceen, hirmaatoo fi fayyadamtoota taasisuu fi guddina ispoortii ammayyeessuu.

am: የንቅናቄ፣ተሳትፎ፣ኩነትና የስፖርት ውድድር ፕሮግራሞች ማዘጋጀትና ማካሄድ
የወጣትና የስፖርት ማህበራት እንዲደራጁና እንዲጠናከሩ ማድረግ
የወጣት ስብዕና መገንቢያ ማዕከላት አገልግሎትን በማሻሻልና በማስተዋወቅ ወጣቶች እንዲጠቀሙ ማድረግ
ማዕከላትና ማዘውተሪያ ስፍራዎች እንዲገነቡና እንዲስፋፉ ማድረግ
የስፖርት ድርጅቶችና ባለሀብቱ በስፖርት ልማት ላይ እንዲሳተፉ ማድረግ
የስፖርት እውቅና እና ሽልማት ስርዓትን ማከናወን
ህብረተሰቡን በስፖርት ለሁሉምና በአካል ብቃት እንቅስቃሴ ማሳተፍ
በትምህርት ተቋማት ስፖርት እንዲስፋፋና እንዲጠናከር ማድረግ
የህብረተሰቡን የስፖርት መዝናኛና ትርዒት ተሳታፊነትና ተጠቃሚነት ማረጋገጥ
የስፖርት ቁሳቁስ እና መሳሪያዎች እንዲሟሉ ማድረግ
የታዳጊ ወጣቶች ስፖርት ስልጠና ልማት ፕሮግራም ማካሄድ
የስፖርት አበረታች መድሃኒቶችና እጾች በስፖርቱ ዙሪያ እንዳይኖሩ ማድረግ ፣የቅድመ ስልጠናና የዕድሜ ትመና ምርመራ ማድረግ
en: Conducting studies
Preparing and conducting mobilization and awareness programs
Engaging youth in various issues
Preparing and conducting mobilization, participation, events, and sports competition programs
Ensuring youth and sport associations are organized and strengthened
Preparing and developing projects
Engaging youth in voluntary service
Providing capacity building training
Improving and promoting the services of youth personality development centers and making them accessible to youth
Working in partnership and collaboration
Ensuring that youth issues are incorporated (in the work of other sectors)
Ensuring centers and recreational areas are built and expanded
Granting sports licenses and renewals
Monitoring sports associations
Ensuring sports organizations and investors participate in sports development
Carrying out the sports recognition and awards system
Engaging the public in 'Sport for All' and physical fitness activities
Ensuring that sports are expanded and strengthened in educational institutions
Ensuring the public's participation and benefit from sports recreation and shows
Ensuring that sports associations become self-sufficient
Ensuring the provision of sports materials and equipment
Conducting a training development program for junior youth sports
Providing sports medicine services
Ensuring that sports doping and drugs are not present in the sports sector, and conducting pre-training and age estimation examinations
Providing support, follow-up, and evaluation
or: Qorannoo gaggeessuu
Sagantaalee kaka'umsaa fi hubannoo qopheessuu fi gaggeessuu
Dargaggoota dhimmoota adda addaa irratti hirmaachisuu
Sagantaalee kaka'umsaa, hirmaannaa, ayyaanaa fi dorgommii ispoortii qopheessuu fi gaggeessuu
Waldaaleen dargaggootaa fi ispoortii akka gurmaa'anii fi ciman taasisuu
Piroojektoota qopheessuu fi gabbisuu
Dargaggoota tajaajila fedhii gaariitiin hirmaachisuu
Leenjii dandeettii cimsuu kennuu
Tajaajila buufataalee ijaarsa amaloota dargaggootaa fooyyessuu fi beeksisuun dargaggoonni akka fayyadamaniif gochuu
Hirmaannaa fi tumsaan hojjechuu
Dhimmoota dargaggootaa hammatanii akka hojjetan taasisuu
Buufataalee fi iddoowwan shaakalaa akka ijaaramanii fi babal'atan taasisuu
Hayyamaa fi haaromsa ispoortii kennuu
Waldaalee ispoortii to'achuu
Dhaabbileen ispoortii fi abbaan qabeenyaa guddina ispoortii irratti akka hirmaatan taasisuu
Sirna beekamtii fi badhaasa ispoortii gaggeessuu
Ummata sagantaa ispoortii hundaaf fi sochii qaamaa irratti hirmaachisuu
Ispoortiin dhaabbilee barnootaa keessatti akka babal'atuu fi cimu taasisuu
Hirmaannaa fi fayyadamummaa bashannanaa fi agarsiisa ispoortii hawaasaa mirkaneessuu
Waldaaleen ispoortii of danda'uu akka danda'an taasisuu
Meekaalee fi meeshaaleen ispoortii akka guutaman gochuu
Sagantaa guddina leenjii ispoortii dargaggoota xixiqqoo gaggeessuu
Tajaajila yaalaa ispoortii kennuu
Qorichoonni jajjabeessitoo fi qorichoonni miidhaa qaban naannoo ispoortii akka hin jiraanne taasisuu, qorannoo duraa leenjii fi tilmaama umurii gaggeessuu
Deggersa, hordoffii fi gamaaggama gochuu

name.or: Wajjira Haqaa Bulchiinsa Kutaa Magaalaa Lideeta

shortDescription.am: የልደታ ክፍለ ከተማ ፍትህ ጽ/ቤት የላቀ ፍትሕ አገልግሎት በመስጠት፣ መብቶችን በመጠበቅ እና የሕግ ተፈፃሚነትን በማረጋገጥ የሚሰራ ቢሮ።
shortDescription.en: Lideta Sub-City office providing high-quality justice services by protecting rights, promoting legal awareness, and ensuring law enforcement.
shortDescription.or: Wajjira magaalaa Lideetaa tajaajila haqaa qulqulluu dhiyeessuudhaan mirgaa eeguu, hubaannoo seeraa guddifachuu, fi rawwaatamummaa seeraa mirkaneessuudhaan hojjata.

vision.am: በ2022 በኢትዮጵያ የፍትሕ ተቋማት ተምሣሌት ሆኖ ማየት፤
vision.en: To become an exemplary institution among justice institutions in Ethiopia by 2030 G.C.).
vision.or: Bara 2022 wajjiralee haqaa Itiyoophiyaatif fakkeenya gaarii ta'u.

mission.am: የከተማ አስተዳደሩንና የነዋሪውን መብትና ጥቅም በማክበርና በማስከበር፣ ንቃተ-ሕግ እንዲዳብር በማድረግ፣ የሕግ ተፈፃሚነትን በማረጋገጥ የላቀ የፍትህ አገልግሎት መስጠት፤
mission.en: By respecting and protecting the rights and interests of the sub-city administration and its residents, by promoting legal awareness, and by ensuring the enforcement of the law, to provide excellent and high-quality justice services.
mission.or: Mirgaa fi faayidaa Bulchiinsa magaala fi jiraattoota magaala kabaajuf kabaachissuu akkasumas hubnii seeraa akka dagaaguu gochuun rawwaatamummaa isaanii mirkaaneessuun tajaajila haqaa qulqulluu ta'e kennudha.

am: የፍትሕብሔር ክርክር በማድረግ የከተማ ነዋሪዉንና የአስተዳደሩን መብት እና ጥቅም ማስጠበቅ
በወንጀል ጉዳዮች መወሰን እና ማስወሰን የነዋሪዉን ንቃተ-ህግ ማሳደግ
የተለያዩ አስተዳደሩ የሚያደርጋቸዉን አስተዳደራዊ ዉሎች የማዘጋጀት
ሰብዓዊ መብትን ከማክበርና ከማስከበር አንፃር የከተማዉን ነባራዊ ሁኔታ ያገናዘበ ዕቅድ በማዘጋጀት መተግበርና ማስተገበር
በከተማዋ የህገ-ወጥ የሰዎች ዝዉዉር ወንጀልን ለመከላከልና ለመቆጣጠር
en: Resolving civil disputes thereby protecting the rights and interests of sub-city residents and the administration
Adjudicating and deciding criminal cases, thereby raising the legal awareness of residents
Preparing various administrative contracts entered into by the administration
From the perspective of respecting and enforcing human rights, preparing plans that reflect the actual conditions of the sub-city, and implementing and monitoring them
Preventing and controlling the crime of illegal human trafficking/migration within the sub-city
or: Falmii dhimmaa siivilii gochuun mirgaa fi faayidaa bulchiinsa magaala fi jiraattoota kabachiisu
Dhiimoota yakkaa murteessuuf murteesiissun hubaannoo seera jiraattoota guddissu
Wal-galteewwaan qaamonnii bulchiinsa rawwatanif sanadaa qopheessuu
Mirgoota namuummaa kabajuuf kabachisuu irratti haala jirattoota bulchiinsa magaalicha bu'uura godhateen karoora qopheessuf rawwachuuf rawwachisisuu
Yakkoota daddabarsaa namoota magaalichaatti rawwatamuu facciisuuf to'achuu

shortDescription.am: የጽህፈት ቤቱ ራዕይ፣ ተልዕኮ እና እሴቶች
shortDescription.en: The Office's Vision, Mission and Values

vision.am: በ2022 ዓ.ም ዘመናዊ የመስሪያ ቦታ በማልማት አቅርቦቱን በማፋጠንና አስተዳደራዊ አሰራሩን በማዘመን በዘርፉ የተሰማሩ ኢንተርፕራዞች እና ኢንዱስትሪዎች ኢኮኖሚያዊ ተጠቃሚነት ተረጋግጦ ማየት፡፡
vision.en: To see enterprises and industries engaged in the sector achieve economic benefit by developing modern work places, accelerating supply and modernizing administrative procedures in the 2022.
vision.om: Bara baajataa itoophiyaa 2022tti, bakko hojii ammayyuumuun, dhiyeessii saffisiisuun fi adeemsa bulchiinsaa harromsuun, dhaabbilee fi indastiriiwwan dameekanaan bobba̛an fayyadamummaa diinagdee isaanii mirkaneeffatanii arguu.

mission.am: የዘርፉን እድገት ያማከለ ተጨባጭ ጥናት ላይ የተመሰረተ እና መሰረተ ልማት የተሟላላት ደረጃውን የጠበቀ የመስሪያ ቦታ ገንብቶ በማስተላለፍ እና ፈጣን አገልግሎትን መሰረት ያደረገ ዘመናዊ አስተዳደርን በመዘርጋት የኢንተርፕራዞች እና አምራች ኢንዱስትሪዎችን ተጠቃሚነት ማረጋገጥ ነው፡፡
mission.en: The goal is to ensure the benefit of enterprises and manufacturing industries by developing and transferring a standardized workplace with complete infrastructure, based on concrete studies focused on sectorial growth, and by establishing a modern administration based on fast service.
mission.om: Kaayyoon isaa bakka hojii sadarkaa isaa eeggate kan bu'uuraalee misoomaa guutuu qabu, qo'annoo dhugaa guddata damee irratti xiyyeeffatuun hojjetamee dabarssuun, akkasumas bulchiinsa ammayyaa tajaajila saffisaa irratti hundaa'e diriirsuun, fayyadamummaa dhaabbilee xixiqqaa fi giddugaleessaa (enterpiraayizii) fi warshaalee oomishaa mirkaneessuu dha.

en: Transparency
Accountability
Equity
Commitment
Effectiveness
Partnership
Encouraging entrepreneurship
Modernity

shortDescription.am: የአዲስ አበባ መሬት ልማት አስተዳደር ጽ/ቤት ዘመናዊ የመሬት ስርዓት በማስተዋወቅ ፍትሕዊ፣ ቀልጣፋ እና ውጤታማ አገልግሎት የሚሰጥ ተቋም ነው።
shortDescription.en: The Addis Ababa Land Development and Administration Office is an institution that provides fair, efficient, and effective services by implementing a modern land system.
shortDescription.om: Wajjira Dagaagina fi Bulchinsa Lafaa Adaamaa Naannoo Addis Ababaa tajaajila haqa qabu, fooyya'aa fi bu'a qabu, sirniitti lafaa ammayyaa hojiirra ooluun kennita.

vision.am: በ2022 ዓ.ም ዘመናዊ የመሬት ልማት እና አስተዳደር ስርዓት የተዘረጋበትና የላቀ አገልግሎት የሚሰጥበት እና የተገልጋይ እርካታ የተረጋገጠበት ተቋም ሆኖ ማየት፡፡
vision.en: In 2022, to see it as an institution where a modern land development and management system is established, excellent service is provided and customer satisfaction is guaranteed.
vision.om: Bara 2022tti, sirna ammayyaa dagaagina fi bulchinsa lafaa hundaa'e, tajaajila gaarii kennamaa fi jaalala fayyadaa mirkaneeffate wajjira ta'uu arguu.

mission.am: በአዲስ አበባ ከተማ ህጋዊ አሰራርን የተከተለ እና ውስን የሆነውን የመሬት ሀብት ያማከለ የመሬት ዝግጅትና ማስተላለፍ ስራ ማከናወን፣ የተጎሳቆሉ አካባቢዎችን መልሶ በማልማት፤የተቀናጀ የመሬት መረጃ አያያዝ እና የመሬት ባንክ ስርዓት በመዘርጋት፣ በማከናወን ፍትኃዊ ቀልጣፋ እና ውጤታማ አገልግሎት መስጠት፡፡
mission.en: Carry out land preparation and transfer work that follows the procedure of Addis Ababa city and focuses on the limited land resources; By redeveloping degraded areas; Providing fair, efficient, and effective services by establishing an integrated land information management and land bank system, and carrying out rights creation work.
mission.om: Hojii qophesuufi dabarsaa lafaa seera magaalaa Addis Ababaa hordoftuu fi dursaa lafaa xiqqaa irratti xiyyeeffate raawwachiisuun; Naannawwan balleeffamoo deebiif dagaaguun; Sirna walitti hidhamaa bulchinsa odeeffannoo lafaa fi baankii lafaa hundaa'uun, tajaajila haqa qabu, fooyya'aa fi bu'a qabu kennuu.

en: Participation
Transparency
Fairness
Providing superior service
Working responsibly
Accountability

am: ዘመናዊ የመሬት ዝግጅት ባንክና ጥበቃ ስርዓትን ማሻሻል
የለማ መሬት ማስተላለፍና ክትትል ስርዓትን ማሻሻል እና አልሚዎች ላይ ክትትል ማድረግ
በከተማዋ ፍላጎት መሠረት የመልሶ ማልማት ስራዎችን ማሻሻል
የለማ ቴክኖሎጂ በመጠቀም ቀልጣፋና ውጤታማ አገልግሎት መስጠት
የተሻሻለ የመሬት ነክ መረጃ አደረጃጀት የአሰራር ጥራትን ቅሬታ አፈታት ስርዓት መዘርጋት
በልዩ ልዩ ልማት ምክንያት ከቦታቸው የሚነሱ ተነሺዎች መልሶ ማቋቋም
የአሰራር ጥራት ኦዲት በማድረግ ብልሹ አሰራርን መቀነስ
en: Improve modern land preparation banking and protection system
Improve land transfer and monitoring system and monitor plots
Improve redevelopment works based on city needs
Improve various possession service delivery
Providing fast and effective service using land technology
Establish an improved land core information management system and complaint resolution system for procedural quality
Strengthen legal and technical issue monitoring
Strengthen complaint response
Rehabilitate people displaced due to various developments
Reduce malpractice by conducting procedural quality audits
Improve monitoring and feedback system
om: Sirna baankii fi tiksuu qopheessuu lafaa ammayyaa fooyyessuu
Sirna dabarsaa lafaa fi ilaaluu fooyyessuufi almiilee ilaaluu
Hojiiwwan deebiif dagaaginaa filannoo magaalatti bu'uura godhan fooyyessuu
Tajaajila saffisaa fi bu'a qabu teeknooloojii lafaa fayyadamuun kennuu
Sirna bulchinsa odeeffannoo bu'uuraa lafaa fooyyessaa fi sirna furuu waa'ee mala qopheessuu lafa
Ilaaluu waa'ee seeraa fi teeknikaa cimsuu
Namoota dhaabbata garaagaraan sababaa bakka isaanii irraa deeman deebifachiisuufi jireenya isaanii dagaaguu
Mala qopheessuu lafaa xiqqeessuu ooditin mala qopheessuu raawwatuun
Sirna ilaaluu fi deebii kennuu fooyyessuu

title.en: Urban Beautification and Green Development Office
title.om: Wajjira Miidhagina Magaalaa fi Misooma Margaa

name.am: የልደታ ክፍለ ከተማ ከተማ ውበትና አረንጓዴ ልማት ጽ/ቤት
name.en: Lideta Sub-City Urban Beautification and Green Development Office
name.om: Wajjira Miidhagina Magaalaa fi Misooma Margaa - Kutaa Magaalaa Lideetaa

shortDescription.am: የልደታ ክ/ከተማ ውበትና አረንጓዴ ልማት ጽ/ቤት የከተማውን ውበት በማረጋገጥ፣ አረንጓዴ ቦታዎችን በማልማት እና በማቆየት፣ ለነዋሪዎች አስደሳችና ጤናማ አካባቢ በመፍጠር የሚሰራ ቢሮ ነው።
shortDescription.en: The Lideta Sub-City Urban Beautification and Green Development Office works to ensure city beauty, develop and maintain green spaces, and create an enjoyable and healthy environment for residents.
shortDescription.om: Wajjira Miidhagina Magaalaa fi Misooma Margaa Kutaa Magaalaa Lideetaa miidhagina magaalaa mirkaneessuuf, bakka margaa misoomsuuf tiksuuf, akkasumas jiraattootaaf naannoo gammachuu fi qorichaa uumuudhaan hojjata.

vision.am: በ2022 ዓ.ም የአዲስ አበባ ከተማ በውበቷ፤በአረንጓዴነቷ ለነዋሪዎቿና ለእንግዶቿ ማራኪና ተመራጭ የአፍሪካ ከተማ ሆና ማየት፤
vision.en: By 2022, Addis Ababa will be the most desirable and preferred African city for its residents and visitors alike, in terms of its beauty and vitality.
vision.om: Bara 2022 keessatti Magaalaa Finfinnee miidhagina ishee fi magariisa ishee waliin, jiraattota fi daawwattotaaf taatee magaalaa bareedduu fi filatamaa Afrikaa keessaa akka taatuu arguu.

mission.am: በኅብረተሰቡና ባለድርሻ አካላት ተሳትፎ የህዝብ መናፈሻዎችን፤አረንጓዴ ቦታዎችን ልማት ማስፋፋት፤የዘላቂ ማረፊያና የህዝብ መፀዳጃ ቤቶችን ልማትና አገልግሎት አሰጣጥን ዘመናዊ፣ ቀልጣፋና ፍትሃዊ በማድረግ የከተማውን ውበት ማረጋገጥ፤
mission.en: Expanding the development of public parks and green spaces with the participation of the community and stakeholders; ensuring the beauty of the city by making the development and service provision of sustainable shelters and public toilets modern, efficient, and equitable.
mission.om: Hirmaannaa hawaasa fi qaamolee hirmaattotaa waliin ta'uun, bakka boqonnaa uummataa; bakka margaa; bakka awwaala waaraa fi mana fincaanii uummataa babal'isuu fi misoomsuun; tajaajila kennuu haala ammayyaa'e, saffisaa fi haqa-qabeessa ta'een raawwachuun miidhagina magaalaa mirkaneessuu.

en: Environmental Compatibility
Sustainability
Participatory
Inclusiveness
Service
Transparency
Accountability
Credibility

am: የተፋሰስ፣ አረንጓዴ አካባቢዎች ወንዝ ዳርቻዎች የማልማት እና የመንከባከብ እንዲሁም የመጠበቅ ፈቃድ አገልግሎት
ከተማው መዋቅራዊ ፕላን መሰረት አረንጓዴ መሰረተ ልማት ተለይተው ዲዛይን ማስወጣት
ካርታ ያልወጣላቸው የአረንጓዴ ልማት ቦታዎች የይዞታ ካርታ እንዲወጣላቸው ማድረግ
በእንክብካቤና አገልግሎት ዘርፍ ለተደራጁ ማህበራትን ቦታውን በውል ማስተላለፍ
ክፍት መናፈሻዎችን በበጎ ፈቃደኝነት የለሚያለሙ አልሚዎች ፈቃድ መሰጠት
የህዝብ መናፈሻ ቦታዎችን እና ፓርኮችን መልሶ ማልማት እና አስተዳደር
በመንገድ ዳርና ስፍራ እጽዋትን መተካት እና መጠበቅ
የከተማ አየር ጥራትን ለማሻሻል የእፅዋት ችግኝ ጣቢያዎችን ማስተዳደር
የህዝብ ንጽህና ቤቶችን መገንባት እና አስተዳደር
ዘላቂ የመቃብር ቦታዎችን አስተዳደር እና የመቃብር ማስረጃ መስጠት
በልዩ ልዩ ልማት ምክንያት ከቦታቸው የሚነሱ ተነሺዎችን መልሶ ማቋቋም
en: Development, maintenance, and permit services for watersheds, green areas, and riverbanks
Designing and identifying green infrastructure according to the city's structural plan
Obtaining a land use map for unmapped green development areas
Transferring land to associations organized in the care and service sector through contract
Preparing payment documents for associations
Providing various trainings
Granting permits to developers who develop open parks voluntarily
Redevelopment and management of public recreational areas and parks
Replacing and maintaining roadside and divider plants
Managing plant nurseries to improve urban air quality
Construction and management of public restrooms
Management of permanent burial sites and issuance of burial certificates
Rehabilitating people displaced due to various development projects
om: Tajaajila misooma, tikfannaa fi eyyama eegumsa bakka bosonaa, bakka margaa fi daandii daangaa kennuu
Karoora ijaarsaa magaalaa (Structural Plan) irratti hundaa'uun misooma margaa adda baasee dizayinii baasuu
Bakka misooma margaa kaardiin abbaa qabeenyaa hin baaneef, kaardiin abbaa qabeenyaa akka ba'u gochuu
Kutaalee hawaasa keessatti too'annoo fi hojii eegumsaaf qophaa'an iddoo margaa jiru waliigaltee (Contract) irratti hundaa'uun dabarsu
Iddoowwan bashannanaa uummataa bifa tola-oolmaa (volunteer) ta'een kan miidhaa hin geessisneef eyyama kennuu
Bakka bashannanaa uummataa fi paarkii deebiif dagaaguu fi bulchuu
Daandii fi daandii daarii irraa biqiltuu bakka bu'uuraa irra deebisuun tiksuu
Qilleensa magaalaa fooyyessuuf bakka itti muka biqilchu bulchuu
Mana fincaanii uummataa ijaaruu fi bulchuu
Iddoo awwaalaa itti fufinsaa qaban bulchuu fi ragaa awwaalaa kennuu
Namoota dhaabbata garaagaraan sababaa bakka isaanii irraa deeman deebifachiisuufi jireenya isaanii dagaaguu

shortDescription.am: የአዲስ አበባ መሬት ልማት አስተዳደር ጽ/ቤት ዘመናዊ የመሬት ስርዓት በማስተዋወቅ ፍትሕዊ፣ ቀልጣፋ እና ውጤታማ አገልግሎት የሚሰጥ ተቋም ነው።
shortDescription.en: The Addis Ababa Land Development and Administration Office is an institution that provides fair, efficient, and effective services by implementing a modern land system.
shortDescription.om: Wajjira Dagaagina fi Bulchinsa Lafaa Adaamaa Naannoo Addis Ababaa tajaajila haqa qabu, fooyya'aa fi bu'a qabu, sirniitti lafaa ammayyaa hojiirra ooluun kennita.

vision.am: በ2022 ዓ.ም ዘመናዊ የመሬት ልማት እና አስተዳደር ስርዓት የተዘረጋበትና የላቀ አገልግሎት የሚሰጥበት እና የተገልጋይ እርካታ የተረጋገጠበት ተቋም ሆኖ ማየት፡፡
vision.en: In 2022, to see it as an institution where a modern land development and management system is established, excellent service is provided and customer satisfaction is guaranteed.
vision.om: Bara 2022tti, sirna ammayyaa dagaagina fi bulchinsa lafaa hundaa'e, tajaajila gaarii kennamaa fi jaalala fayyadaa mirkaneeffate wajjira ta'uu arguu.

mission.am: በአዲስ አበባ ከተማ ህጋዊ አሰራርን የተከተለ እና ውስን የሆነውን የመሬት ሀብት ያማከለ የመሬት ዝግጅትና ማስተላለፍ ስራ ማከናወን፣ የተጎሳቆሉ አካባቢዎችን መልሶ በማልማት፤የተቀናጀ የመሬት መረጃ አያያዝ እና የመሬት ባንክ ስርዓት በመዘርጋት፣ በማከናወን ፍትኃዊ ቀልጣፋ እና ውጤታማ አገልግሎት መስጠት፡፡
mission.en: Carry out land preparation and transfer work that follows the procedure of Addis Ababa city and focuses on the limited land resources; By redeveloping degraded areas; Providing fair, efficient, and effective services by establishing an integrated land information management and land bank system, and carrying out rights creation work.
mission.om: Hojii qophesuufi dabarsaa lafaa seera magaalaa Addis Ababaa hordoftuu fi dursaa lafaa xiqqaa irratti xiyyeeffate raawwachiisuun; Naannawwan balleeffamoo deebiif dagaaguun; Sirna walitti hidhamaa bulchinsa odeeffannoo lafaa fi baankii lafaa hundaa'uun, tajaajila haqa qabu, fooyya'aa fi bu'a qabu kennuu.

en: Participation
Transparency
Fairness
Providing superior service
Working responsibly
Accountability

am: ዘመናዊ የመሬት ዝግጅት ባንክና ጥበቃ ስርዓትን ማሻሻል
የለማ መሬት ማስተላለፍና ክትትል ስርዓትን ማሻሻል እና አልሚዎች ላይ ክትትል ማድረግ
በከተማዋ ፍላጎት መሠረት የመልሶ ማልማት ስራዎችን ማሻሻል
የለማ ቴክኖሎጂ በመጠቀም ቀልጣፋና ውጤታማ አገልግሎት መስጠት
የተሻሻለ የመሬት ነክ መረጃ አደረጃጀት የአሰራር ጥራትን ቅሬታ አፈታት ስርዓት መዘርጋት
በልዩ ልዩ ልማት ምክንያት ከቦታቸው የሚነሱ ተነሺዎች መልሶ ማቋቋም
የአሰራር ጥራት ኦዲት በማድረግ ብልሹ አሰራርን መቀነስ
en: Improve modern land preparation banking and protection system
Improve land transfer and monitoring system and monitor plots
Improve redevelopment works based on city needs
Improve various possession service delivery
Providing fast and effective service using land technology
Establish an improved land core information management system and complaint resolution system for procedural quality
Strengthen legal and technical issue monitoring
Strengthen complaint response
Rehabilitate people displaced due to various developments
Reduce malpractice by conducting procedural quality audits
Improve monitoring and feedback system
om: Sirna baankii fi tiksuu qopheessuu lafaa ammayyaa fooyyessuu
Sirna dabarsaa lafaa fi ilaaluu fooyyessuufi almiilee ilaaluu
Hojiiwwan deebiif dagaaginaa filannoo magaalatti bu'uura godhan fooyyessuu
Tajaajila saffisaa fi bu'a qabu teeknooloojii lafaa fayyadamuun kennuu
Sirna bulchinsa odeeffannoo bu'uuraa lafaa fooyyessaa fi sirna furuu waa'ee mala qopheessuu lafa
Ilaaluu waa'ee seeraa fi teeknikaa cimsuu
Namoota dhaabbata garaagaraan sababaa bakka isaanii irraa deeman deebifachiisuufi jireenya isaanii dagaaguu
Mala qopheessuu lafaa xiqqeessuu ooditin mala qopheessuu raawwatuun
Sirna ilaaluu fi deebii kennuu fooyyessuu

name.am: የልደታ ክፍለ ከተማ ጽዳት አሰተዳደር ጽ/ቤት
name.om: Wajjira Bulchinsa Qulqullinaa - Kutaa Magaalaa Lideetaa

shortDescription.am: የልደታ ክፍለ ከተማ ጽዳት አሰተዳደር ጽ/ቤት የደረቅ ቆሻሻ ማስወጣትን እና ማስተዳደርን በማጠናከር እና የከተማ ጽዳትን በማረጋገጥ ለነዋሪዎች ፅዱ እና ጤናማ አካባቢ ለመፍጠር የሚሰራ ቢሮ ነው።
shortDescription.en: The Lideta Sub-City Cleaning Management Office works to ensure city cleanliness and create a clean and healthy environment for residents by enhancing solid waste collection and management.
shortDescription.om: Wajjira Bulchinsa Qulqullinaa Kutaa Magaalaa Lideetaa qulqullina magaalaa mirkaneessuufi jiraattootaaf naannoo qulqulluu fi qorichaa uumuudhaan, kuusaa fi bulchinsa ballaa qaamaa cimsuudhaan hojjata.

vision.am: በ2022 ዓ/ም አዲስ አበባ ፅዱ፣ የደረቅ ቆሻሻ ዑደታዊ ምጣኔ ሀብትን ተግባራዊ ያደረገች የአፍሪካ ሞዴል ከተማ ሆና ማየት፡፡
vision.en: By 2022 E.C., to see Addis Ababa as a model African city that is clean and has implemented circular economy for solid waste.
vision.om: Bara 2022 Amajjii Itoophiyaatti, Finfinnee magaalaa qulqulluu ta'ee fi dhaabbata diinagdee naannoo ballaa qaamaa raawwatte Afrikaa keessatti fakkeenya ta'uu arguu.

mission.am: የአዲስ አበባ ከተማ ነዋሪዎችን ግንዛቤ በማሳደግ ና በማሳተፍ፣ የደረቅ ቆሻሻ አገልግሎት አሰጣጡን ዘመናዊ፣ ቀልጣፋ ና ውጤታማ በማድረግ እና ዑደታዊ ምጣኔ ሀብትን ስራ ላይ በማዋል ከተማዋን ፅዱ ማድረግ ነው፡፡
mission.en: To make the city clean by raising and engaging the awareness of Addis Ababa city residents; by making solid waste service delivery modern, efficient, and effective; and by implementing circular economy.
mission.om: Magaalaa qulqulluu gochuudhaan jiraattota magaalaa Finfinnee beeksisa godhuufi hirmaachisuudhaan; tajaajila kuusaa ballaa qaamaa ammayyaa, saffisaa fi bu'a qabu taasisuudhaan; akkasumas dhaabbata diinagdee naannoo hojiirra ooluudhaan.

en: Fairness
Accountability
Service
Occupational Safety
Solid Waste is a Resource
Cleanliness and Modernity

am: የደረቅ ቆሻሻን ከቅብብሎሽ ጣቢያ በ24 ሰዓት የማጓጓዝ አገልግሎት
የደረቅ ቆሻሻን አገልግሎት አሰጣጥ ድጋፍ ና ክትትል በሳምንት 2 ጊዜ ማከናወን
ለደረቅ ቆሻሻ አገልግሎት አሰጣጥ ለሸርክ ና ማህበራት የደረቅ ቆሻሻ አገልግሎት ክፍያ ሰነድ በ4 ሰዓት ማረጋገጥ
ለመልሶ መጠቀም ና ኡደት ማድረግ ማህበራት የገበያ ትስስር ማድረግ
የቤት ለቤት ግንዛቤ በስታንዳርዱ መሰረት የመስጠት አገልግሎት
en: 24-hour solid waste transportation service from transfer stations
Conducting solid waste service delivery support and monitoring twice a week
Verifying solid waste service payment documents for contractors and associations within 4 hours
Facilitating market linkages for reuse and recycling associations
Providing door-to-door awareness raising service according to the standard
om: Tajaajila geebbii ballaa qaamaa iddoo dabarsaa irraa sa'aatii 24 keessatti
Deeggarsaa fi ilaaluu tajaajila kuusaa ballaa qaamaa torbanii lama yeroo raawwachuu
Galmee kaffaltii tajaajila kuusaa ballaa qaamaa shirkaa fi walga'iiwwaaf sa'aatii 4 keessatti mirkaneessuu
Walga'iiwwan deebiifayyadamsiisaa fi naannoomsaa gidduu tasaarsii gabaasaa gochuu
Tajaajila beeksisaa mana manaatti sadarkaan hundaa'e kennuu
